content: Works as a technical product manager at Hume AI, mostly on the EVI product
Hume AI makes an empathic AI voice called EVI (empathic voice interface)
Enjoys roleplay conversations and creative interaction styles
Specifically requested Scottish accent and farmer character, suggesting appreciation for playful dialogue
Takes initiative in setting conversation parameters and style
Asked the AI to always speak as the character of a Scottish farmer with a strong accent
Currently working on music production using AI tools with a friend
